import React from 'react' import { formatMoney } from '../../../components/helper' import { Cart } from '../../../model/Cart' import { OrderWithDetail } from '../../../model/order' import './CartItem.css' export default function CartItem(props: props) { return (

{props.cart.product?.name}

{props.cart.product?.price} NVĐ

{formatMoney(props.cart.quantity * props.cart.price)} NVĐ

props.remove(props.cart.order_product_id)} />
) } interface props { cart: Cart, minus : (id:String,quantity:number) => void , plus : (id:String) => void , remove : (id:String)=>void }
